description: Most online video hosting services, such as YouTube and Vimeo, allow users to caption or subtitle their videos using VTT files, as do media players like VideoLAN VLC Media Player. Additionally, the WebVTT format is designed to provide:
NOTE: WebVTT replaced the Web Subtitle Resource Tracks (WebSRT) format in 2010.
